Figure D-8 Stay in DR for up to one year 524 IBM z16 (3931) Technical Guide Multi-system environment A two-site, two-system environment is only the base infrastructure. Flexible Capacity for Cyber Resiliency also is suited for complex multi-system environments. Flexible Capacity from several systems can be transferred to single systems in Site B or vice-versa (see Figure D-9). Figure D-9 Multi-system Flex Capacity example Movement of capacity does not need to be “all to one”: the capacity also can be split. However, the total capacity that is active on all systems after the swap cannot exceed the total capacity that is active before the swap.
